title: Font ID - Anheuser - Old Metal Cut Sign
content:
I realize I am probably not going to find an exact match for type like this, but I thought I'd submit it to the boards and see if there is anything close to it out there. In particular the capital S and the R are quite unique. Especially the R with the crooked leg.  
Thanks for looking.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [full.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516205522/http:/typophile.com/files/full.jpg) | 224.73 KB |
author: thompson

comments.content: it reminds me of Emigre's Brothers..but it's not a match obviously.

Yehan - yep that is the closest one I've found. That and Antique Half Block from LHF [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/antiquehalfblock.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516205522/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/antiquehalfblock.shtml)
